## Hand class

Holds a wad of cards, where each card is displayed separately.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Hand<TCard extends Card> extends LinearCardContainer<TCard> 
```
**Extends:** [LinearCardContainer](./bge-core.linearcardcontainer.md)<!-- -->&lt;TCard&gt;
